According to Butler paxosRepairHistoryIsntUpdatedInForcedRepair is flaky in the past week.

[https://butler.cassandra.apache.org/#/ci/upstream/compare/Cassandra-4.1/cassandra-4.1]

Seen also in CircleCI:
